mapper.select: SELECT id, username, gender, email, phone, motto, register_time, rating, ranking, ac_num, acb, school, faculty, major, cla, student_id, graduation_year FROM t_user_base_info WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT username, nickname, acb FROM t_user_base_info left join t_user_custom_info ON t_user_base_info.username = t_user_custom_info.username ORDER BY acb DESC, rating DESC
SELECT username, nickname, ac_num FROM t_user_base_info left join t_user_custom_info ON t_user_base_info.username = t_user_custom_info.username ORDER BY ac_num DESC, rating DESC
SELECT username, nickname, rating FROM t_user_base_info left join t_user_custom_info ON t_user_base_info.username = t_user_custom_info.username ORDER BY rating DESC

SELECT ubi.id, ubi.username, gender, email, phone, motto, register_time, rating, acb, nickname, avatar_url FROM t_user_base_info ubi, t_user_custom_info uci WHERE ubi.username = uci.username
AND ubi.username like #{username}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_base_info WHERE substring(register_time,1,10) = #{time}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_base_info ubi, t_user_custom_info uci WHERE ubi.username = uci.username
AND ubi.username like #{username}
